and verbal communication skills and a sense of ownership and driveltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout The JobltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe Learner Journey and Measurement Strategy team within Mastery Strategy and Operations uses data and insights to define a competency and rolebased personalized learning journey This team is responsible for defining a universal framework describing the learners journey as they go through learning experiences agnostic of role tenure or context and setting the high level crossteam strategy to deliver against this vision This includes understanding what training is required or expected through a mapping of universal competencies and measuringquantifying if the learning demonstrated the impact through behavior change capability development and ultimately business metrics This helps ensure that measurement is an ongoing and iterative process that transforms Masterys approach to understanding and meeting the demands of our learnersltbrgtltbrgtAs a Learning Impact Analyst you will design and analyze business impact experiments to measure incremental impact on learners both through behavior change and business results of Mastery training programs You will also help develop analysis and insights that help Mastery understand the engagement reaction and impact of its content You will utilize recent developments and new technologies in causal inference to estimate incremental impacts using nonexperimental methods Youll need to be selfdriven and comfortable working with various statistical methods data systems Application Programming Interfaces and visualization tools You will need to possess an excellent acumen for experiment design and incremental
